pipeline-scan.name: Pipeline2DetailedReport
pipeline-scan.description: translate Veracode Pipeline Scan results into DetailedReport XML format, allowing you to import them into an IDE plugin for remediation.

pipeline-scan.name: pipeline2html
pipeline-scan.description: run a Veracode Pipeline Scan and generate a human-readable .HTML file from the Veracode pipeline verification results.json file.

pipeline-scan.name: Pipeline2JUnitXml
pipeline-scan.description: reads the JSON output of a Veracode Pipeline Scan and converts it into a standard JUnit test results XML file.

pipeline-scan.name: PipelineResultsCompare
pipeline-scan.description: checks if there are any issues present on a pipeline results file that aren't present on another, supporting filtering by severity.

pipeline-scan.name: veracode-pipeline-mitigation
pipeline-scan.description: Retrieves findings with APPROVED mitigations from an application's policy scan (or sandbox) and creates a baseline file for Pipeline Scan.

pipeline-scan.name: veracode-pipeline-PR-comment
pipeline-scan.description: Sends output of Pipeline Scan to a comment on a pull request.

pipeline-scan.name: veracode-pipeline-with-baseline
pipeline-scan.description: GitHub Action to perform a Veracode Pipeline Scan and, optionally, compare the results against a set of baseline results.
